strikeout_item_lines.description: Item line text to be struck out
choices: brazier of harmony (level 5, 150 gp; Pathfinder Rage of Elements 122) messenger 5 ring (level 9, 700 gp) moderate healing potion (level 6, 50 gp) spellstrike ammunition (type IIT) (level 7, 70 gp) crafter’s eyepiece (level 3, 60 gp) +1 mace (level 3, 36 gp) +] striking mace (level 4, 101 gp) +] striking called shears (level 7, 450 gp; Pathfinder Bestiary 2 184, Lost Omens Knights of Lastwall 89) +2 striking called shears (level 10, 1,350 gp; Pathfinder Bestiary 2 184, Lost Omens Knights of Lastwall 89) Players with this chronicle sheet have access to the shears weapon for all characters
strikeout_item_lines.example: brazier of harmony (level 5, 150 gp; Pathfinder Rage of Elements 122) messenger 5 ring (level 9, 700 gp) moderate healing potion (level 6, 50 gp) spellstrike ammunition (type IIT) (level 7, 70 gp) crafter’s eyepiece (level 3, 60 gp) +1 mace (level 3, 36 gp) +] striking mace (level 4, 101 gp) +] striking called shears (level 7, 450 gp; Pathfinder Bestiary 2 184, Lost Omens Knights of Lastwall 89) +2 striking called shears (level 10, 1,350 gp; Pathfinder Bestiary 2 184, Lost Omens Knights of Lastwall 89) Players with this chronicle sheet have access to the shears weapon for all characters

summary_checkbox.description: Checkboxes in the adventure summary that should be selected
choices: acquiesced and fought him honorably or
summary_checkbox.example: acquiesced and fought him honorably or
